Don Tate (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na otu n'ọnwaa Disemba, 1963) bụ ónyé edemede America na ónyé na-ese ihe osise nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-eme ihe ike na-akwalite agbụrụ na ọdịbendị na akwụkwọ ụmụaka

Ọ na-ekwu na mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ ga-agụ encyclopedia iji chọpụta ụwa nwere ọdịbendị dị iche iche; dabere na akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke oge ya, ọ "eche na ụwa bụ ọcha". O guzobere blọọgụ ndị Africa America na-eto eto The Brown Bookshelf ma na-enyere aka na mkpọsa #WeNeedDiverseBooks iji melite ihe dị iche iche dị na akwụkwọ ụmụaka.
Tate malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Say Hey: A Song of Willie Mays (Jump at the Sun/Hyperion, 2000), nke Peter Mandel dere.
Lee & Low Books bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya dị ka ónyé édémédé, It Jesʹ Happened: When Bill Traylor Started to Draw, nke R

Ọ bụ akụkọ ndụ "na-adọrọ mmasị" nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri ọdịnala Bill Traylor, onye bụbu ohu. Akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara ọtụtụ ònyínyé dịka Lee & Low New Voices Honor Award na Ezra Jack Keats New Writer Honor. A họọrọ ya dị ka Kirkus Best Children Books List Selection, a Booklist Editorsī Choice, 2012, na New York Public Library Top 100 Titles for Reading and Sharing nakwa otu n'ime Bank Street College of Education Best Children's Books of the Year, 2012.
Na mgbakwunye na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Tate na-enyekwa ndị na-emepụta ngwaahịa ikike nka ya
KIDZ bụ akara nke ihe ndina ụmụaka na ihe ịsa ahụ gụnyere akwụkwọ mgbidi, ọkụ ọkụ, ihe osise mgbidi na bọtịnụ drawer
O nwekwara akara akwa / akwa ụmụaka dị na ụlọ ahịa akwa pụrụ iche, nke gosipụtara atụmatụ ya
My Peepz, otu ndị Africa America, na-ere ndị tweeners ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na ahịa kalenda
Tate mepụtara kalenda n'ihi enweghị ndị Africa America na ngwaahịa ndị dị ugbu a.
Ya na ezinụlọ ya bi na Austin, Texas.
